content: peacock appliqué crochet pattern you will need size g 4 5mm hook vanna s choice yarn in eggplant vanna s choice yarn in sapphire vanna s choice yarn in honey vanna s choice yarn in pea green vanna s choice yarn in kelly green -with the eggplant crochet 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring join with a slip_stitch -chain 1 crochet 3 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 3 half_double_crochet and 1 slip_stitch in the next st 1 slip_stitch and 3 half_double_crochet in the next st join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet -chain 1 single_crochet in the next 11 sts half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts half_double_crochet and slip_stitch in the next st slip_stitch in next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet and tie off -join the sapphire in the next st directly after the stitch you just tied off -single_crochet all the way around 24 sts and join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet -chain 1 slip_stitch in the next 7 sts single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st x3 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st x2 single_crochet in next st join with a sl st to the first slip_stitch -chain 1 slip_stitch in next 16 sts half_double_crochet in next 6 sts slip_stitch in next 7 sts join with a slip_stitch to the first slip_stitch and tie off -join the honey in the next st directly after the stitch you just tied off -chain 1 * single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * all the way around until you reach the last st 2 single_crochet in the last st join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet -chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 5 sts turn chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet in next 32 sts 2 single_crochet in the side of the two row of half_double_crochet do not join -turn chain 1 single_crochet in next 36 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet in last st join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet tie off -join the pea green in the next st directly after the stitch you just tied off -single_crochet in the next 37 sts half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next 5 sts join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet and tie off -join the kelly green in any stitch from the previous row -* single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * all the way around -join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet and tie off weave in any visible ends i nichole verville copyright this pattern as of september of 2008 please do not sell this pattern please do not distribute it without crediting me for the pattern you may sell the finished product
